data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Basicly Class::AccessorMaker does the same as the ones already out
    there but with a nicer interface, just to make live a little more
    lazy.

    The package will also come with Class:AccessorMaker::Private, which
    does some really hard data-hiding on the values of the accessors
    created. I am not sure wheter or not I need to submit a second
    request for this...
